title: Braid Scots (1904) Smith's New Testament
description: Braid Scots New Testament translation by William Wye Smith and published in 1904. Scots is a West Germanic language variety spoken in Scotland and parts of Ulster in the north of Ireland.

language.name: Scots
language.area: Scotland except highlands; lowlands: Aberdeen to Ayrshire; Northern Ireland. Doric in northeast Scotland; Lallans in South Scotland lowlands; Ulster in Northern Ireland. Also in Ireland.
